article.description: Femi Olujobi scored 27 points and hauled down 11 rebounds and North Carolina A&T shot past Mid-Atlantic Christian 115-76 Tuesday night.
article.headline: Olujobi 27 points as NC A&T rolls by Mid-Atlantic Christian
article.linkText: Olujobi 27 points as NC A&T rolls by Mid-Atlantic Christian
article.story: GREENSBORO, N.C. -- Femi Olujobi scored 27 points and hauled down 11 rebounds and North Carolina A&T shot past Mid-Atlantic Christian 115-76 Tuesday night. Olujobi, the national leader in points per game and total field goals, has scored 20 points or better in every game this season, and he notched his third scoring-rebounding double-double this month. Japhet Kadji added 15 points, Aaren Edmead 13 and Donte Watson 10 for the Aggies (4-1). North Carolina A&T led 16-2 early and was up 57-33 at the half. Edmead, Davaris McGowens and Raymon Pratt made season debuts for the Aggies. Pratt scored eight points, McGowens six with five rebounds. North Carolina A&T shot 55 percent from the field with 48 rebounds, 26 assists and 10 steals. Edmead and Kameron Langley had two steals each. Kadji grabbed eight rebounds. The Mustangs, who compete in the USCCAA, were out-boarded 48-29 and turned the ball over 18 times. Grayson Tejeda led with 18 points.

statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover
